title: Mathematics Practical Competency Enhancement Program Based on Socio-Scientific Reasoning Learning (SSRL)

context.additional_context: A process where in-service practitioners collaboratively solve mathematical problems while systematically learning and analyzing SSRL (Self-Scaffolded Reflection and Learning) strategies
